owl:Ontology.dc1:termsdescription: Ontology for bridge classification and properties

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Gibt an, von welcher Himmelsrichtung kommend das Bauwerk errichtet werden soll (BW-Richtung)
Specifies the direction from which the building is to be constructed.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Richtungsursprung
direction origin

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Gibt an, zu welcher Himmelsrichtung zielend das Bauwerk errichtet werden soll (BW-Richtung)
Indicates the direction in which the building is to be constructed.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Richtungsziel
direction target

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relationship between a Bridge and the main responsible dbo:Organisation that administrates the Bridge.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Baulast Konstrukt
has main responsible

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relationship between a Bridge and a responsible dbo:Organisation.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Responsible

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relationship between a Bridge and a responsible department that administrates the Bridge.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Amt
has responsible department

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relationship between a Bridge and a responsible workshop.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has responsible workshop

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relationship between a Bridge and a responsible UI/UA responsible partner.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: UI/UA pflichtiger Partner
has UI/UA responsible partner

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Angle of construction related to site. Unit in [°].
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Bauwerkswinkel
construction angle

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Gibt die Gesamtfläche der Überbauelemente der Brücke an. Einheit in [m²].
Specifies the total area of the superstructure components of the bridge. Unit in [m²].
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Brückenfläche
bridge area

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Gibt die Breite der Brücke an (ohne Ausbau). Einheit in [m].
Specifies the width of the bridge (without extension). Unit in [m].
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Breite
bridge width

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment:
defines the height which needs to fulfil the following criteria:
- free space between the roadway and the lower edge of the superstructure of a bridge or between its piers or columns;
- vertical space in the cross-section of the road to be kept clear of obstacles
Unit in [m].
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Lichte Höhe
clear height

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment:
defines the width of a single span which needs to fulfil the following criteria:
- free space between the roadway and the lower edge of the superstructure of a bridge or between its piers or columns;
- vertical space in the cross-section of the road to be kept clear of obstacles
Unit in [m].
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Lichte Weite bei Einfeld
clear width of single span

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment:
Gibt an, ob die Datenerfassung abgeschlossen worden ist.
true = Datenerf. abgeschlossen false = Datenerf. nicht abgeschlossen / unvollständig

Indicates whether data acquisition has been completed.
true = data acquisition completed false = data acquisition not completed / incomplete
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Datenerf. abgeschl.
completed data acquisition

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Year in which the bridge has been constructed.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Baujahr
construction year

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Gibt die Krümmung der Brückenplatte an. Krümmung kann entweder mit R in [m] angegeben werden oder als "false" bzw. nicht gekrümmt.
Specifies the curvature of the bridge plate. Curvature can either be specified with radius in [m] or as "false" or not curved.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Krümmung
curvature

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Referes to the file ID of the corresponding construction file.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Bauwerksakte-Nr.
file ID

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment:
Gibt an, ob das Bauwerk unter Denkmalschutz steht.
true = Bauwerk unter Denkmalschutz false = kein Denkmalschutz

Indicates whether the building is under monument protection.
true = building under monument protection false = no monument protection
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Denkmalschutz
historic preservation

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Gibt die maximale Konstruktionshöhe an. Einheit in [m].

Specifies the maximum construction height.
Unit in [m].
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Konstruktionshöhe max.
maximum construction height

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment:
Specifies the maximum covered height.
Unit in [m].
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Max. Überschüttungshöhe
maximum covered height

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Gibt die maximale Längsneigung der Brückenplatte an. Einheit in [%].

Specifies the maximum longitudinal inclination of the bridge slab.
Unit in [%].
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Maximale Längsneigung
maximum longitudinal gradient

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Gibt die maximale Querneigung der Brückenplatte an. Einheit in [%].

Specifies the maximum transverse inclination of the bridge slab.
Unit in [%].
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: maximale Querneigung
maximum transverse gradient

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Gibt die minimale Konstruktionshöhe an. Einheit in [m].

Specifies the minimum construction height.
Unit in [m].
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Konstruktionshöhe min.
minimum construction height

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment:
Specifies the minimum covered height.
Unit in [m].
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Min. Überschüttungshöhe
minimum covered height

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Gibt die Gesamtlänge der Brücke an. Einheit in [m].

Specifies the total length of the bridge.
Unit in [m].
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Gesamtlänge
overall length

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Gibt die Gesamtbreite der Brücke an. Einheit in [m].

Specifies the total width of the bridge.
Unit in [m].
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Gesamtbreite
overall width

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Gibt den Zwischenraum der Überbauten an. Einheit in [m].

Specifies the space between the superstructures.
Unit in [m].
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Zwischenraum Überbauten
spacing between superstructures

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment:
Gibt an ob die Brücke einer Verkehrslast ausgesetzt ist bzw. befahren wird.
true = Unter Vekehr / befahren false = Nicht unter Verkehr / gesperrt

Indicates whether the bridge is exposed to a traffic load.
true = Under traffic / traffic false = Not under traffic / blocked
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Stadium
under traffic

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The external characteristic of the beam bridge is usually the visible separation of the superstructure (bridge girder) from the substructure (supports, abutments) by bearings. The bearings transfer the loads from the superstructure to the substructures and give the bridge girder the necessary positional stability and movement capability. The cross-sectional shape in the longitudinal direction corresponds externally to a beam, usually the girder height is constant. Superstructures with variable superstructure heights are possible. As a rule, the bottom chord has a curvature corresponding to the moment load, it is vouched. The beam makes optimum use of the strength of the material and is used as a static system for conventional bridges with small to medium spans (approx. 80 m). Economical spans for beam bridges are up to 100 m, approx. 100-200 m for Extradosed bridges and from 200 m for cable-stayed bridges. The beam bridge is frequently used because of its comparatively simple construction. Many bridges over motorways are designed in this way. Beam bridges can be constructed in transverse direction with different cross-section geometries.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Balkenbrücke
Beam bridge

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Bridge in which the main beams comprise girders in the shape of a hollow box. The box girder normally comprises either prestressed concrete, structural steel, or a composite of steel and reinforced concrete. The box is typically rectangular or trapezoidal in cross-section.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Box girder bridge
Hohlkastenbrücke

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Composite steel bridges are structures consisting of steel main girders and a concrete deck slab above them.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Composite bridge

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Responsible department that administrates the bridge and its maintenance.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Department

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Bridge that uses girders as the means of supporting its deck.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Girder bridge
Plattenbalken- / Trägerrost- Brücke

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Bridge that uses prestressed concrete as building material.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Prestressed concrete bridge

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Bridge specially designed to guide a railway line and the railways running on it over obstacles.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Railway bridge

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Bridge that uses reinforced concrete as building material.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Reinforced concrete bridge

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Bridge that can be used by motor vehicles and motor vehicles and usually also by pedestrians, bicycles and other vehicles.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Road bridge

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Short-span bridge consisting of a reinforced-concrete slab resting on abutments
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Slab bridge

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Bridge that uses mainly steel as building material.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Steel bridge

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Bridge that uses mainly (natural) stone as building material.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Stone bridge

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Movable bridge that carries a segment of roadway across a river.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Transport bridge

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Bridge that uses mainly wood as building material.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Wood bridge

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Responsible company / workshop for constructing the bridge.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Meisterei
Workshop
